content: this no sew crochet whale pattern easy crochet whale amigurumi pattern is a beginner friendly crochet pattern make an adorable mini crochet whale as a gift or for yourself with this easy crochet pattern my instructions are organized and are very clear to understand there are also high quality photos to help you along pattern includes links to video tutorials so crocheting will be easy and fun the pattern is available in english size of the finished toy about 7cm 2 76 inches long with cotton yarn and 3 mm crochet hook you can use the same pattern to make larger or smaller toys by using finer or bulkier yarn pick a crochet hook at least a size smaller than suggested on yarn label and crochet tightly enough to achieve a tight gauge that will not allow the stuffing to show through the fabric ⚡️difficulty easy for this pattern you need to have basic crochet and amigurumi skills and to know how to read crochet patterns you need to know the following crochet terms - magic_ring magic_ring uk=magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet n = magic_ring crochet n single_crochet stitches into the adjustable loop - cs = chain stitch uk=chain - slip_stitch = slip_stitch uk=slip_stitch - single_crochet = single_crochet stitch uk=double_crochet - increase = increase in single_crochet uk=increase in double_crochet - decrease = decrease in single_crochet uk=decrease in double_crochet - single_crochet 4 increase x n = repeat the pattern between parentheses n times ⚡️supplies - 3 mm crochet hook - yarn yarnart jeans - one pair of 6 mm safety eyes - scissors stitch marker /scrap piece of yarn - white embroidery thread needle - soft stuffing - yarn needle this pattern is for personal use only you do not have permission to recopy rewrite or redistribute this pattern in any form as your own or otherwise you may not resell my patterns but you are welcome to sell any of the items made from my patterns
